website_summaries.verdict: These convenient pods of Clorox bleach work well in conjunction with laundry detergent pods.
pros: Easier to handle than liquid bleach
Pods do not require measuring before use
Same cleaning power as liquid bleach but safer to transport
cons: Tablets are extremely concentrated – can damage some fabrics and machine components
May not fully dissolve in toilet tank or bowl

customer_reviews.title: Tasted terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst snack I have ever had. Stick to tide pods if you want a delicious snack. These dissolve well in the washing machine though, and weigh much less than liquid bleach if you live in California so your laundry room is communal and super far from your apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good product... weird lids.
customer_reviews.text: It's bleach and does what bleach is supposed to do, but the lids on these things are from the pits of Hell. I mean it's nearly impossible for me to open them with a hand issue I have. Looks simple enough, "squeeze and turn", but for whatever reason they just don't turn that easily. I realize due to the "kids eat pods thing" they're trying to cover themselves, but wish there was a different type of lid system.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Only for pure white loads and then less than spectacular results.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my front load washer and threw one is with the laundry as directed. Was very glad I decided to try these on a rag load rather than one I cared about as the places the tablet made contact with before disolving were clearly identifiable, which also meant that other whites came out less than dazzling.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, no more splashed bleach
customer_reviews.text: I have ruined too many articles of clothing when pouring bleach. I use bleach often to clean clothing and the rest of the house. These could not be easier to use. I just put one in the washer with white clothing or things I want to disinfect and forget about it. They also take up less room than a bottle of bleach. Win-Win in my book
customer_reviews.author: AZN8TV

customer_reviews.title: Bleach packs torn with powder everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Half of the packs in each of the little containers were ripped and empty with the powdered bleach sitting at the bottom of the container. While this doesn't necessarily take too much away from performance, it definitely defeats the convenience of buying the bleach in pack form. I've attached photos of one of the containers with the contents, but they're all like that.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan W.

customer_reviews.title: Mess-Free Solution for Those Really Tough Stains
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a Subscribe and Save subscription, and get a shipment every few months. They are convenient and mess-free for my HE machine and really work! Extra stained clothes may need two, and definitely use the hottest, heaviest setting on your machine to be sure they get the max effect.
customer_reviews.author: awakenedvc

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Product. Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I would've given these clorox bleach pods 5 stars but i am still new to using them and haven't had to do an extra dirty load of laundry yet. But so far these pods have been working great. I have just been using 1 pod for a normal size load of laundry and the clothes are very clean. The whites come out quite bright. Very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: DerbyDudeDon

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use my Dash buttons for easy ordering of important home products that I would previously purchase at Sam's Club. I get amazing deals this way and have everything delivered right to my door. I was originally disappointed that I couldn't order liquid bleach with my button but I thought I would try these out. I'm so glad I did! I use significantly less bleach and it keeps my white laundry perfect. These are now a must have in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle Épée

customer_reviews.title: Product Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the product clearly and thought is was clorax wipes( always read all of the Product when buying) but when the product came, I gave it away to friends because I really don't use the clorox packs in my wash but they did. They loved the clorox packs and so they went to good use,,yes I could have sent them back but I made the mistake. Execellent product
customer_reviews.author: Daren K Chidester

customer_reviews.title: Exploded or disintegrated defective bleach pouches
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these by a case of four on auto delivery for the last two years with no problems. This last shipment, November 2019, at least half of the bleach pouches in each canister were defective. They had either exploded or disintegrated. This happened before I opened them and right out of the shipping box. This situation leaves a mess of powder, empty pouches, and intact pouches in the canister. It was past the 30 day window before I opened the first canister and all 4 canisters have at least 50% defective pouches. Thus, I am stuck with an entire case of defective pouches.
customer_reviews.author: LdyStarfyr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if I had even used bleach. Lack of cleaning and lack of that signature smell makes this product a no-go for me. These did not even whiten my whites! LOL it actually made my bath towels a little yellow!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Smart product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and I love it. Concentrated Clorox bleach. Just drop in water and go for it. I've saved my old bleach bottle, and I drop 1-2 of these and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Frediwar

customer_reviews.title: No mess, no spills... toss and wash
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of these until I stumbled across them on amazon while looking for Clorox wipes. I will never use liquid bleach in my washer again after having bought these. You just toss them into the washer with your clothes and wash. No messy liquids and no chance of getting it on your other garments. So glad I saw these on amazon. I’ve looked since I received them at my local grocery chain and they don’t carry these pods. Will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S

customer_reviews.title: SMALL CONTAINER - smaller than what you find in store
customer_reviews.text: So these are the normal bleach packs I am used to buying. However they cost WAY more than I normally pay at Target. I didn’t realize this until I saw the size of the container when I Opened my amazon box. This is what I would spend on four containers twice the size. I guess I should have checked the size so my fault. Went by the pics and I’ve never seen this size container. Won’t order again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy & reliable for a clean result.
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to use and are really reliable. I use them on my dishtowels and white with a very satisfactory result. But I also use them in the bathroom, where I will throw one in the toilet whenever I want a little extra freshness between cleanings. If your water is hard and leaves stains in the toilet bowl, try this product U see if it doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: islandgirl1056

customer_reviews.title: If you splash bleach, this is the answer!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been good with containing the bleach as I pour, so these things are AWESOME! I just drop them in the washer with the load of laundry and magic happens without the worry of stains. Works just as well as liquid bleach and bonus: you don't have the harsh smell. I haven't used it diluted in water yet to clean with, but I am sure I will love the results from that just as much. Definitely worth a try and the money if you are on the fence about getting it
customer_reviews.author: Angie M

customer_reviews.title: I just love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Finally Clorox came up with these Clorox pods in powder form. So easy just take a pod out of the container toss it in your washer no need to worry about bleach spilling and possibly getting on something and ruining it including your clothes on you. I just love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Blue origin stains
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I use I cant get out the Blue Origin stain from working for that demoricatic founder of that rocket factory. Maybee if he would use some of this he would clean up the management stains of the people who run his machine shop at blue Great product. Go clorox
customer_reviews.author: MERKINZAPPER

customer_reviews.title: Not a disinfectant !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s my fault for not paying attention better to this product . I thought it was a disinfectant ! I found I am not the only one making this mistake even with the bottles of Clorox .
customer_reviews.author: Loti d

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: I was always ruining my clothes pouring out of gallon jugs–----- this alleviated that problem. Just toss in & go without any bleach spots on your good clothes. I also own offshore shrimp boats & cleanliness is always an issue , plus they stay out 30-45 days so room is also an issue. Jugs of bleach took up a lot of room. Plus you have to save all plastic & bring to dock for recycling. Handy & we use 1 tab to a bucket of water for mopping & cleaning
customer_reviews.author: katv

customer_reviews.title: Clorox Tablets are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are the handiest, best working bleach around in my opinion. My Husband has been waiting for them to re-stock them. We have a White Fountain in our Yard, and it gets kind of green at timees, so he puts one of the Tablets in, and it clears up and is beautiful and so White. It''s great oin the wash, too. I will be using it as long as we can get it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn F. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: The only "pod" that makes sense.
customer_reviews.text: I use bleach a lot. But these are fab for the laundry. I still buy the bottles for other uses but must have these in the laundry room. Just the right amount & you don't get it on your hands or what you're wearing.
customer_reviews.author: C.V. Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Great job in whitening laundry items.
customer_reviews.text: A little inconvenient to have to wait 5 minutes to put in to the wash load. Also, use 2 pods for dirty whites, soak with three for bad stains
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Not a great idea in front loader
customer_reviews.text: What we didn't like was that the only this product works in the front load washer is to place it in the drum first...whatever garment is close to it gets an awful bleached out spot. It doesn't work if placed in drawer designed for bleach/detergent. Loved that it didn't make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bryant

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: No more spilled liquid bleach! I throw these into the front load washing machine with my Tide Pods, let the water fill and the drum spin a few times, pause the machine, and then throw in the laundry. No damage to clothing or linens so far....
customer_reviews.author: T. VP

customer_reviews.title: Flu season is a great time to try these
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how I have lived without these! I actually think they work better than the liquid bleach. No more accidental bleach splashes. I actually like the small container because it's just enough but not some huge item that's too heavy to carry out when doing laundry.
customer_reviews.author: K Olds

customer_reviews.title: bleach packs
customer_reviews.text: I like using these little pods over liquid bleach for mopping my kitchen floor. The scent is actually pleasant, not as harsh smelling as liquid bleach. The pods clean well also with no residue.
customer_reviews.author: yours truly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These packs work very well, keeps your washing machine cleaner and prevents you from spilling it on your clothing, unlike the liquid bleach! No measuring and pouring!
customer_reviews.author: David N. Clary

customer_reviews.title: Handy w/ no Messes
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and make no mess. I drop one in as the washer is filling up and then I throw another one in once is gets going.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be bigger in quantity in each container. I failed to read description. I love that there is no splash, but it’s hard to tell if it’ll be too much bleach!! Edit: one of my container was busted on the i side!! Not happy. Check your products when they come guys
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bleach packs for several years and I have had problems finding them locally. When I saw them on Amazon, I ordered them. Perfect!!!! I like them because you don't have to worry about measuring and possibly getting liquid bleach on something you don't want bleached. I just throw one in the washer with the whites...............how easy is that???
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: The bleach is good, but the plastic packet melted and bonded to our clothes! They had to be discarded. I now cut them open and throw out the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Bee

customer_reviews.title: Safe way to keep the white white
customer_reviews.text: Brighten up your whites perfectly without worrying about splashing on the colors!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, affordable & it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: These zero splash bleach packs are so convenient. I use them in my laundry (no worrying about backsplash or dripping), in my bathroom (I put one in the toilet tank and one in the bowl) to keep them clean and disinfected. Once they dissolve, the nasty chore of toilet bowl cleaning is so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful if you have to use a lot of bleach
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful if you have to use a lot of bleach. We are an animal shelter and all linens are washed with bleach. This is so easy, throw a pod in the washer. It used to be pouring in the soap drawer, spilling it on clothes, the machine etc. We really like these!
customer_reviews.author: Blind Cat Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Busted pods
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Packs all busted up inside. Mostly just the power in the container..
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to try these...
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived, I was surprised by the small size of the containers and the small quantity in each container. I LOVE the convenience and ease of using the pods. I'm just not sure if I will purchase again until the quantity and price is worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Eowyn89

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious jobs. Not for families with children.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of no splash. BUT, This product works minimally. If works if you are maintaining whites, white (if there are no stains). If you have small children and you need to clean sheets from overrun poopy diapers or blood stain from bloody nose, this will not work. Not only did it not work the first time, it didn’t work the 2nd and 3rd time. I ran the same laundry three times each time adding a new pack. The stain spots faded, but they were still visible. I went back to the liquid bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I really don't care for these. They might be ...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't care for these. They might be convenient but they don't leave the same scent on clothes as regular bleach. I find that they leave an odd smell. I'll stick to using the thicker version of liquid Clorox know as splashless. It's more economical and leaves things smelling fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardine Cizmar

customer_reviews.title: Great! Some pods break before delivery though :(
customer_reviews.text: Loves these things. I hate using bleach since I'm always liable to spill it on the floor or myself and this solves that issue. Easy to use. Although many of the pods come broken. I hope clorox can find a way to fix that some day. The tide pods / dishwasher pods I use are never broken in their package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy if you have any kind of arthritis easy to use great confident to use
customer_reviews.author: linda ashton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and bleach very well
customer_reviews.text: Not sodium hypochorite, but chlorine bleach and very good at getting out stains and getting whites back to WHITE. I use cotton percale sheets and this is the best. and so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Twin Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Gone are the days of messy liquid bleach
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I throw one in with a pod for a load of whites and its perfect. No mess and no worrying about getting bleach on the carpet right in front of my w/d
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirl

customer_reviews.title: Like using these bleach pods
customer_reviews.text: I like these bleach pods. I've used them for years but it seems most of the grocery stores have stopped stocking them. I'm pleased to have found them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: bugs

customer_reviews.title: No more bleached clothes. Better than the liquid.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these over the liquid bleach. No splashes. No more bleached clothes. No need for measuring. I just pop in a pod or two and walk away. It cleans and whitens the clothes very well. Just as good as the liquid if not better. I keep this on my subscription list.
customer_reviews.author: abigail pierre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Washing Machine Cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use it to clean my washing machine when it gets dirty from dog fur, detergent pod remains, or develops an odor. Just throw one in and use the machine cleaning cycle. The washer is always super clean afterward. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie BG

customer_reviews.title: No turning back now
customer_reviews.text: These pods are amazing. I use pods for my laundry detergent and pods now for my bleach. Keeps my laundry room mess free and they are so easy to pop in to the washer. I'll never go back to liquid bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 2 Twin Snowflakes

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few years to wash the nasty cleaning rags used when cleaning my house. They help take away the smells of the various cleaners used as well as their residue. I hated to use plain bleach and was so happy to see these
customer_reviews.author: Calinan

customer_reviews.title: No more ruining clothes with splashed bleach!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't someone think of these sooner? When I think of all of the clothes I could have spared from being ruined with bleach splashes, it makes me sick! These are awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amberblakebrett

customer_reviews.title: Clorox pods
customer_reviews.text: I won’t lie, I thought these were wipes and not pods, so I was a little frustrated when I opened up the container. With that said, they worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Chavana

customer_reviews.title: Love these packets.
customer_reviews.text: Might be a bit pricey, but oh so worth the cost when you consider the amount of money you safe on clothing that has been splattered with liquid bleach and eventually finds its way into the trash bin. Highly recommend this version of bleach.
customer_reviews.author: susanne K stinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and transport
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy these are to use for disinfecting things like the kitchen sink and toilet bowl. Good value for a 4 pack of them.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Great and convenient, never spill bleach on yourself (or the laundry mat floor) again!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can just drop these in at the beginning of a wash cycle and don’t need to stand around watching the “OK bleach” light to come on (if you don’t have a washer with an area specifically for bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Marika

customer_reviews.title: Works on Tough Stains
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to try and get our restaurants rags white again and while that has not happened (mostly because coffee stains are horrible) they do look much better so we are planning on continuing use.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rochkind

customer_reviews.title: Best for the visually impaired
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I discovered these. My mother and sister are both visually impaired and it's hard for them to measure out liquid bleach (and unsafe for them). With these, there are no measuring. All they have to do is throw one pod in the wash. There is no difference in the results between these or the liquid bleach. The only trouble is finding them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberle J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for transport
customer_reviews.text: Had to transport bleach to Florida after Hurricane Irma. These tablets made it super easy. No mess and they do not take up much room. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Reel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - get the more expensive tablets
customer_reviews.text: Worst washing pods I have ever used. Often the powder does not completely dissolve in an extended wash cycle, so I am left with significant amounts of bleach all over the washer seal and washer. Some pods arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: from MD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them to clean all over my house. Toilets, garbage disposal, trash cans, dishwasher. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: bcsus83

customer_reviews.title: Stick with liquid bleach
customer_reviews.text: I love anything to make laundering a lot easier and I thought this would help; it’s convenient but liquid bleach is better. It did not get my whites as clean as regular bleach.
customer_reviews.author: N Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loved them, until...
customer_reviews.text: Loved these until they left big yellow bleach stains on my toddlers clothes. Be sure to follow instructions to avoid these.
customer_reviews.author: Sabin Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Better than liquid
customer_reviews.text: You can use these bleach packs the same way you use liquid bleach. It's more convenient than liquid because it doesn't splash and the outside packaging dissolves quickly. You can dissolve it in water to clean surfaces like your floor or countertops.
customer_reviews.author: gypsymom

customer_reviews.title: These work great and they’re easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I hate using liquid bleach. It splashes and I hate measuring, so I get too much or too little. These make bleach so easy to use. Pop one in, done. Perfect amount for each load.
customer_reviews.author: JTJim

customer_reviews.title: Best invention, works good!
customer_reviews.text: These work good, for large load I use one more than what the directions say to use. But my whites come out white.. no mess. I be been buying these for over a year now and won’t go back to liquid
customer_reviews.author: ney

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I hate the liquid splashing all over. These work do good. Packaging dissolve quickly
customer_reviews.author: starrmercysadie

customer_reviews.title: Great for being prepared
customer_reviews.text: I use to use these then got lazy and bottle bottle bleach. After the virus hit and bleach was not to be found I saw these and remember. Now I have enough to have on hand for any more of the nasty virus, and keep my home safe.
customer_reviews.author: Patt2tt

customer_reviews.title: Convenience without the Splash.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these bleach pods. So, convenient and no splashes, ever. They don't even have that strong toxic bleach smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Accidental purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering bleach wipes but these are very handy. They are bleach pods. I use them in laundry and in dishwasher. They can be used anywhere you use bleach but neater. No splashing. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE CONVENIENCE
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Clorox Bleach Packs. They are very easy to use. I use liquid Clorox but once in a while it spills. I'm more comfortable using the bleach packs. Great product. Nice job Clorox!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: No smell when you open package
customer_reviews.text: I have an asthma attack when I smell bleach. These make it possible for me to use bleach again. I put the laundry on with one of these before I leave the house for work errands and the smell has disappeared
customer_reviews.author: B. J. L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent .. multi uses
customer_reviews.text: Never saw this product before in stores .. my daughter loves them. Will buy again when it comes available
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hughis

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big bleacher and love the convenience (and lack of mess) that these provide
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big bleacher and love the convenience (and lack of mess) that these provide. Used to buy them at my local Target but they never seem to have them anymore so I've started ordering these multi-packs through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jordanmj

customer_reviews.title: No splash back.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little worried but these things are great. I just drop them in the sink. No more bleach stains on my clothes while cleaning
customer_reviews.author: LEeElee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product because I didn't have to haul out a big hug of bleach. These tablets dissolve instantly in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela LaBarge

customer_reviews.title: Not wipes
customer_reviews.text: Misread the ad for this, I thought I was getting disinfectant wipes. Too much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: DR in MO

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I'm so over measuring out bleach and this was perfect! Cleans just like the liquid... just wish I could buy larger quantities in one container. Thanks Clorox!
customer_reviews.author: honeysmother

customer_reviews.title: Convienence
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for when we travel for the convienence of not needing liquid bleach and need to wash laundry on vacation together with tide pods these are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super love this product. I love that it won't stain my carpet like liquid beach if I accidentally drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these little things. I love that you can’t spell bleach on your clothes when you’re washing whites.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself some time, and buy  the liquid Clorox bleach
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the results this product offers. I will continue to use liquid Clorox bleach instead. No thank you. But I do plan on repurposing the four containers that the bleach packets came in. That's the only reason I gave 2 stars... I don't like the results at all
customer_reviews.author: trina jackson

customer_reviews.title: Rise tub after use
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but even when used in hot wayer, we found not all the crystals dissolved & so the next load of clothes has bleach spots
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but convenient
customer_reviews.text: Costly, of course, but we are RV'ers, so it is super convenient to carry along.
customer_reviews.author: grammy lynn

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are so economical and work like liquid. I even drop them in toilet
customer_reviews.author: Sha-rone

customer_reviews.title: Splash-Proof
customer_reviews.text: I use this to soak my humidifier tank to disinfect. I love the pods! It’s more expensive but it does not splash everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Anuela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect partner to laundry pods.
customer_reviews.text: Makes it really easy to portion out bleach for cleaning. And the child proof cap gives me peace of mind my daughter can't get into the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: James Freeman

customer_reviews.title: No more lugging around gallons of bleach and having them spill
customer_reviews.text: So convenient. I own a business and have to wash a lot of towels this is the best thing to me since sliced bread. The same with the little pillows that the soap comes in. If you’re at the laundry mat as often as I am you would Understand what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberli S. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: It's bleach
customer_reviews.text: It's bleach it does what bleach is supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Snow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: All came in good condition nothing wrong. Love them so easy to pop one in the toilet to clean or a bucket of water to wipe down counters.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: works great for both
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. I use them in the dishwasher and in the laundry, works great for both!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: No more splashes
customer_reviews.text: These Clorox pods are great. Super convient and no more splashes.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use- no drips, spills or measuring!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bleach pods- so easy to use! No measuring, no drips or spills and perfect for my front loading washing machines.
customer_reviews.author: Beth and Mitchell Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really like the convenience of this product and don't notice a difference
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great little Pods
customer_reviews.text: These are very good for my café as we wash our dishes by hand and use the Clorox as the sanitizer it’s perfect for the sink size
customer_reviews.author: marshpup

customer_reviews.title: I really like these for laundry but they are also great for ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for laundry but they are also great for dropping into a toilet and also to sit in a sink to clean and disinfect. Glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as the liquid but 5 stars on ease of use. 1 star on value as you need 3 packets to do one load of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be healthy... Wear gloves @ anytime 😬
customer_reviews.text: I received my package few mns ago Be Safe / Cautious and keep up a gr8 job

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Love the convince and portability of this. I like them so much, I gift them!

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Changed from liquid Clorox because of the splashing and heaviness of the larger container was very surprised that this works as well if not better than liquid

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to liquid bleach
customer_reviews.text: The convenience of real bleach without the messiness of a liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: These are way better to use than liquid bleach
customer_reviews.text: These are way better to use than liquid bleach. I just pop one in the wash and away I go. They whiten and brighten!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of popping one of these into the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of popping one of these into the washing machine and not having to lug around a bottle of liquid. And they seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F

product_meta.title: Clorox Zero Splash Bleach Packs, 4 Pack
product_meta.description: Clorox Zero Splash Bleach Packs bring you the Clorox Bleach clean in a convenient pre-measured solid pack for easy dosing. The solid bleach packs allow you to enjoy whiter laundry and cleaner surfaces without the splash and spills. Clorox Zero Splash Bleach Packs are a convenient solution for cleaning fabrics, toilets, sinks and hard, nonporous surfaces. These specially formulated packs activate upon contact with water for added control. Simply throw a Bleach Pack in the washer drum or drop a pack into a bucket, sink or toilet and stir to dissolve. The packs will dissolve fully in the wash. These compact bleach pods make it easy to grab a pack or two of these and go. No mess, just fresh clean clothes. Clorox Zero Splash Bleach Packs let you clean with the same trusted Clorox power without worrying about bleach spills, splatters or other laundry mishaps.
feature_bullets: CLOROX BLEACH: Use Clorox Bleach Packs as you would regular bleach – the packs are a controlled way to clean with bleach
BLEACH PACKS: The convenient laundry packs are filled with water activated solid bleach crystals so you can easily control the way you clean
SPLASHLESS BLEACH: No more worrying about bleach spills or splashes, these packs allow you to enjoy the same great Clorox Bleach liquid in a form that’s easier than ever to use

MULTIPURPOSE BLEACH: Use the bleach packs to fight tough stains on your white laundry or take this bleach out of the laundry room and use on household surfaces including countertops, floors, toilets and more
LAUNDRY BLEACH: Clorox Bleach Packs can be used in standard and high efficiency washing machines and are great for everyday cleaning

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
